p: Mature C. acaulis L. cypselae were obtained from the Botanical Garden of Maria Curie-Skłodowska University (UMCS) in Lublin, Poland (51°16′ N, 22°30′ E). They were identified by Mykhaylo Chernetskyy and deposited in the Botanical Garden of UMCS (voucher specimen no. 2005A). They were grown in an open field. The cypselae were collected in the second half of August 2019. Once harvested, the cypselae were dried at room temperature.
